content: multiples of 8 + 7 sts work 2 row of stockinette row 1 rs k5 skpo yo k1 yo k2tog *k3 skpo yo k1 yo k2tog repeat from * to last 5 sts k5 row 2 ws and every alt row purl row 3 k6 yo sl2 k1 p2sso yo *k5 yo sl2 k1 p2sso yo repeat from * to last 6 sts k6 row 5 as row 2 row 7 - 10 work 4 row of stockinette row 11 k1 skpo yo k1 yo k2tog *k3 skpo yo k1 yo k2tog repeat from * to last st k1 row 13 k2 yo sl2 k1 p2sso yo *k5 yo sl2 k1 p2sso yo repeat from * to last 2 sts k2 row 15 as row 11 row 17 - 20 work 4 row of stockinette repeat from row 1 be sure to block and check gauge before starting by making a big enough gauge swatch at least 15 x 15 cm certain materials might sag and fabric will extend with drape so adjust hook size appropriately skills used ●work in the round ●knit & purl ●certain increases and decreases see special techniques ●pick up sts to work around edges ●i-cord and i-cord bind off ●provisional cast on 1 https //nomadstitches com/blog/snowdrops
